title: Ôn tập kiểm tra cuối kỳ 1 - Tiếng Anh 7 Global Success
description: Ôn tập đề thi cuối học kỳ 1 Tiếng Anh 7 - Global Success với giải thích chi tiết

theory.brief: Đề thi HK1 Tiếng Anh 7 bao gồm các dạng bài: Nghe hiểu (TRUE/FALSE, chọn đáp án), Đọc hiểu, Ngữ pháp, Viết lại câu, và Viết câu từ gợi ý.
examples: I don't have any oranges, but I have some apples. (Some/Any)
This film is more exciting than the TV show. (So sánh hơn)
He didn't go to school last Monday. (Quá khứ đơn)

exercises.title: Listening - Minh's Area TRUE/FALSE
exercises.instruction: Nghe đoạn audio và xác định các câu sau đúng (TRUE) hay sai (FALSE)
exercises.tapescript: People in my area often have three meals a day: breakfast, lunch and dinner. For breakfast, we usually have pho or eel soup with bread. Sometimes we have instant noodles or xoi (sticky rice). Lunch often starts at 11:30 a.m. Most of us have lunch at home. We often have rice, fish, meat, and vegetables. Dinner is the main meal of the day. It's also the time when family members gather at home, so it takes a bit longer than the other meals. It often starts at around 7:30 p.m. We usually have rice with a lot of fresh vegetables and seafood or meat. We normally talk about everyday activities during the meal. Then we have some fruit and green tea. I think the food in my area is fabulous. It's very healthy and delicious.

questions.statement: People in Minh's area often have four meals a day.
questions.explanation: Người dân thường ăn BA bữa một ngày, không phải bốn bữa.

questions.statement: Most of them have lunch at home.
questions.explanation: Đúng. Bài nghe nói: 'Most of us have lunch at home' - Hầu hết chúng tôi ăn trưa ở nhà.

questions.statement: Lunch is the main meal of the day in his area.
questions.explanation: Bữa TỐI mới là bữa chính, không phải bữa trưa.

questions.statement: After dinner, they often have some fruit and green tea.
questions.explanation: Sau bữa tối, họ thường ăn trái cây và uống trà xanh.

hints: Chú ý số bữa ăn trong ngày
Bữa nào là bữa chính?

exercises.title: Listening - Street Painting
exercises.instruction: Nghe và chọn đáp án đúng
exercises.tapescript: Street painting - or street art - is an old type of art. In the 16th century artists began to draw on the pavement using chalk. Today, you can see street painting events everywhere. They attract many people who come to enjoy and take part in them. Many of them are free too. So join in and become an artist yourself! One of the largest events in the United States is the Lake Worth Street Painting Festival. It began in 1994 and now occurs every February with the support of artists and volunteers. It is free for everyone. About 100,000 visitors come to enjoy it. About 600 artists work on the pavement to make the street a huge art gallery!

questions.question: Street painting began...
questions.explanation: Bài nghe nói: 'In the 16th century artists began to draw on the pavement' - Vào thế kỷ 16, các nghệ sĩ bắt đầu vẽ trên vỉa hè.

questions.question: At the street painting event, you can...
questions.explanation: Bài nghe nói: 'So join in and become an artist yourself!' - Hãy tham gia và trở thành một nghệ sĩ!

questions.question: The Lake Worth Street Painting Festival happens...
questions.explanation: Bài nghe nói: 'now occurs every February' - Diễn ra hàng năm vào tháng 2.

questions.question: About ___ artists take part in the Lake Worth Street Painting Festival.
questions.explanation: Bài nghe nói: 'About 600 artists work on the pavement' - Khoảng 600 nghệ sĩ làm việc trên vỉa hè.

hints: Chú ý các số liệu về thời gian và số lượng

exercises.title: Reading - Quoc Hoc Hue School
passage: Quoc Hoc - Hue is one of the (1)___ schools in Viet Nam. It is on the bank of the Huong River, in Hue. It was founded in (2)___. It used to be a school for children from rich and royal families.

Well-known people such as Ho Chi Minh, Vo Nguyen Giap, Xuan Dieu studied there. Nowadays, the school is for gifted students. They are intelligent and study hard. They have to pass an entrance exam to enter the school.

The school has over (3)___ classrooms with TVs, projectors, and computers. It also has a swimming pool, a library, two English labs, four computer rooms, and many other modern facilities. The school is one of the (4)___ and most beautiful schools in Viet Nam.

questions.question: Blank (1): Quoc Hoc is one of the ___ schools
questions.explanation: Trường Quốc Học là một trong những trường LÂU ĐỜI NHẤT (oldest) ở Việt Nam, thành lập năm 1896.

questions.question: Blank (2): It was founded in ___
questions.explanation: Trường được thành lập năm 1896.

questions.question: Blank (3): The school has over ___ classrooms
questions.explanation: Trường có hơn 50 phòng học (theo SGK Unit 6 Skills 1).

questions.question: Blank (4): one of the ___ and most beautiful schools
questions.explanation: Dùng so sánh nhất 'largest' để đi cùng với 'most beautiful'. Cấu trúc: one of the + adj (so sánh nhất) + N.

hints: Chú ý cấu trúc so sánh nhất
Đọc kỹ thông tin về năm thành lập

exercises.title: Reading - Water Puppetry
passage: Yesterday Mary went to see a water puppet show at the Thang Long Water Puppet Theatre in Ha Noi. She found the show fascinating.
The puppets were made from wood and the artists controlled them in the water by using long sticks behind a screen. The show was about the daily life of Vietnamese people and famous folk tales.
The puppets danced and moved beautifully on the water. There were also singers and musicians who played traditional music. Mary loved the show very much and she took many photos.

questions.explanation: Mary đi xem múa rối nước (water puppet show).

questions.explanation: Các buổi biểu diễn thường về cuộc sống hàng ngày (everyday life).

exercises.title: Reading - Acne (Fill in the blanks)
passage: Acne is a skin condition. It causes small (1)___ spots on the face and neck.
It affects 70-80% of young people between (2)___. More girls have acne than boys. It's not a serious disease but young people want to avoid it. Here are some tips for taking care of skin with acne:
- Go to bed early and get enough sleep
- Eat more fruit and (3)___, and less fast food
- Wash your face with special soap for acne, but no more than (4)___ a day
- Don't touch or pop spots, especially when your hands are dirty
- If it gets serious, see a doctor

questions.question: Blank (1): small ___ spots
questions.explanation: Mụn gây ra các đốm nhỏ màu VÀNG (yellow) trên mặt và cổ.

questions.question: Blank (2): young people between ___
questions.explanation: Mụn ảnh hưởng 70-80% thanh thiếu niên từ 12-20 tuổi.

questions.question: Blank (3): Eat more fruit and ___
questions.explanation: Nên ăn nhiều trái cây và RAU (vegetables), ít đồ ăn nhanh.

questions.question: Blank (4): no more than ___ a day
questions.explanation: Rửa mặt không quá HAI LẦN (twice) một ngày.

hints: Đọc kỹ thông tin về cách phòng ngừa mụn

exercises.title: Reading - Pho
passage: Pho is one of the most popular dishes in Viet Nam. It is made mainly with rice noodles and beef or chicken.
The broth is made by slowly cooking beef or chicken bones for a long time. People add fresh herbs, bean sprouts, and chili sauce to their pho.
Vietnamese people can enjoy pho at any time of the day - for breakfast, lunch, or dinner. Many restaurants serve pho 24 hours a day!

exercises.title: Listening - Street Painting TRUE/FALSE
exercises.instruction: Nghe đoạn audio và xác định các câu sau đúng (TRUE) hay sai (FALSE)
exercises.tapescript: Street painting - or street art - is an old type of art. In the 16th century artists began to draw on the pavement using chalk. Today, you can see street painting events everywhere. They attract many people who come to enjoy and take part in them. Many of them are free too. So join in and become an artist yourself! One of the largest events in the United States is the Lake Worth Street Painting Festival. It began in 1994 and now occurs every February with the support of artists and volunteers. It is free for everyone. About 100,000 visitors come to enjoy it. About 600 artists work on the pavement to make the street a huge art gallery!

questions.statement: Street painting began in the 6th century.
questions.explanation: SAI. Bài nghe nói: 'In the 16th century artists began to draw' - Street painting bắt đầu từ thế kỷ 16, không phải thế kỷ 6.

questions.statement: At a street painting event you can become an artist.
questions.explanation: ĐÚNG. Bài nghe nói: 'So join in and become an artist yourself!' - Hãy tham gia và trở thành một nghệ sĩ!

questions.statement: The Lake Worth Street Painting Festival happens every month.
questions.explanation: SAI. Bài nghe nói: 'now occurs every February' - Lễ hội diễn ra HÀNG NĂM vào tháng 2, không phải hàng tháng.

questions.statement: About 6,000 artists take part in the Lake Worth Street Painting Festival.
questions.explanation: SAI. Bài nghe nói: 'About 600 artists work on the pavement' - Khoảng 600 nghệ sĩ tham gia, không phải 6,000.

hints: Chú ý các con số
16th century = thế kỷ 16

exercises.title: Listening - Minh's Area
exercises.instruction: Nghe và chọn đáp án đúng
exercises.tapescript: People in my area often have three meals a day: breakfast, lunch and dinner. For breakfast, we usually have pho or eel soup with bread. Sometimes we have instant noodles or xoi (sticky rice). Lunch often starts at 11:30 a.m. Most of us have lunch at home. We often have rice, fish, meat, and vegetables. Dinner is the main meal of the day. It's also the time when family members gather at home, so it takes a bit longer than the other meals. It often starts at around 7:30 p.m. We usually have rice with a lot of fresh vegetables and seafood or meat. We normally talk about everyday activities during the meal. Then we have some fruit and green tea. I think the food in my area is fabulous. It's very healthy and delicious.

questions.question: What do they usually have for breakfast?
options: pho or eel soup with bread
rice or eel soup with bread
questions.explanation: Họ thường ăn phở hoặc cháo lươn với bánh mì cho bữa sáng.

questions.question: What time does lunch start?
questions.explanation: Bữa trưa bắt đầu lúc 11 giờ 30.

questions.question: What do they normally do during the meal?

have some fruit and green tea
questions.explanation: Trong bữa ăn, họ thường nói chuyện về các hoạt động hàng ngày.

questions.question: What does the writer think about the food in his area?
questions.explanation: Tác giả nghĩ đồ ăn ở vùng anh ấy rất tuyệt vời (fabulous).

hints: Chú ý thông tin về bữa ăn và thời gian

exercises.title: Reading - Pho (Fill in the blanks)
passage: Pho is a special kind of traditional Vietnamese dish. Its main (1)___ are rice noodles and slices of beef or chicken.
It is one of (2)___ common dishes you will find in Viet Nam. The rice noodles are made (3)___ the best kind of rice.
The meat (beef and chicken) (4)___ with pho is boneless and cut into thin slices.

questions.question: Blank (1): Its main ___ are rice noodles
questions.explanation: Main INGREDIENTS = nguyên liệu chính.

questions.question: Blank (2): one of ___ common dishes
questions.explanation: Cấu trúc: one of + THE MOST + adj + N = một trong những... nhất.

questions.question: Blank (3): made ___ the best kind of rice
questions.explanation: Made FROM = được làm từ (khi nguyên liệu đã biến đổi).

questions.question: Blank (4): The meat ___ with pho is boneless
questions.explanation: SERVED là phân từ quá khứ dùng như tính từ bổ nghĩa cho 'meat'. The meat served with pho = thịt được phục vụ kèm phở.

hints: Chú ý cấu trúc so sánh nhất và giới từ

exercises.title: Reading - Imperial Academy
passage: The Imperial Academy (Quoc Tu Giam) was the first university in Viet Nam. It was founded in 1076 by Emperor Ly Nhan Tong.
The Academy trained talented students for the country. One of the most famous teachers there was Chu Van An.
In 2003, four statues of Confucius, Chu Van An, and two other scholars were built. The Doctors' tablets at the Imperial Academy were recognized as a Memory of the World by UNESCO.

questions.question: When was the Imperial Academy founded?
questions.explanation: Quốc Tử Giám được thành lập năm 1076.

questions.question: Who was one of the most famous teachers?
questions.explanation: Chu Văn An là một trong những thầy giáo nổi tiếng nhất.

questions.question: When were four statues built?
questions.explanation: Bốn bức tượng được xây dựng năm 2003.

questions.question: Which sentence is NOT TRUE?
options: Imperial Academy is the first university in Viet Nam
Doctors' tablets were recognized by UNESCO
Imperial Academy was built by Le Thanh Tong
questions.explanation: SAI vì Quốc Tử Giám được xây bởi Lý Nhân Tông, không phải Lê Thánh Tông.

hints: Đọc kỹ thông tin về năm thành lập và người sáng lập
